008BE8C7.Phase110Description: Aneta got nothing but a scolding for her kind gesture towards her mother. When angry townsfolk accused her of horrible crimes, her mother did nothing! I must find Aneta and protect her from the angry mob!

0871A46B.Toast: A spate of grisly deaths terrifies a group of villagers who fear a dark power is at work.

13139A08.Phase102Description: Aneta is home safe, but her mother does not seem happy to see her...

30DC76D6.Phase10Description: I found a scene of fire and bloodshed in the ruins, just as the man described. I survived the demons, but a terrified girl emerged from her hiding place. I must make sure she is unharmed.

5296A16C.Callback6Header: Search for survivors at the Abandoned Ruins

9367FF5C.Phase34Description: Aneta got nothing but a scolding for her kind gesture towards her mother. When angry townsfolk accused her of horrible crimes, her mother did nothing! I must find Aneta and protect her from the angry mob!

A5EFB09D.Phase26Description: Aneta and I have found all the flowers she needed. Hopefully I can get her home before her mother worries.

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: A man in Zarbinzet claimed someone is killing villagers with demonic magic. He asked me to search the ruins outside of town for survivors.

F4A9EC5A.Phase14Description: The young girl's name is Aneta, and once she learned I was not another demon, she begged me to help her finish her task to find flowers for her sick mother.
